title: Interpretation of a dream about attending a relative’s wedding by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about attending a wedding soon One of the happy events that can make a person happy is attending the wedding of his relatives and family gatherings, and when he attends them in a dream, they have hints and signs that must be recognized to help the dreamer interpret his vision and know whether it leads to good or evil, and in this article We will present the largest number of issues and interpretations that concern the great scholars and interpreters in the world of dreams, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about attending a nearby wedding: The vision of attending a relative’s marriage carries many indicators and signs that can be identified through the following cases: Attending a party indicates The wedding of a relative in a dream indicates hearing happy news and the arrival of joys and happy occasions for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is going to the wedding of one of his relatives, this symbolizes the great goodness and abundant money that he will earn from work or legal inheritance in the coming period. The dreamer who sees it Attending a relative’s wedding is a sign of the happiness and prosperity that she will enjoy in her life. Interpretation of a dream about attending a relative’s wedding Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of seeing a relative’s wedding in a dream due to its frequent occurrence, and the following are some of the interpretations coming from it: Ibn Sirin interprets the presence of a man at a wedding His relative in a dream indicates an improvement in his financial circumstances and reaping large financial profits that will change his life for the better. If a girl sees that she is going to the wedding of one of her relatives in a dream, this symbolizes her thought and need for engagement and marriage, which is reflected in her dreams, and she must pray to God to provide for her. A good husband. Interpretation of a dream about attending the wedding of a relative of Ibn Shaheen. One of the most prominent interpreters who dealt with the interpretation of attending a marriage between relatives is Ibn Shaheen, and the following are some of his sayings: The interpretation of a dream about attending the wedding of one of Ibn Shaheen’s relatives explains the power and influence that the fortuneteller will have in his life in the coming period. If a married woman dreams That she will attend the wedding of her unmarried relative, this symbolizes the closeness of this girl’s relationship and her marriage to a handsome young man, great wealth. A man who sees that he is invited to attend a relative’s wedding in a dream is an indication of the enormous and abundant sustenance that he will obtain in his life. Interpretation of a dream about attending a party A relative’s wedding to an unmarried woman. The interpretation of a dream about attending a relative’s wedding in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl is suffering from an illness and seeing in her dream that she is going to the wedding of one of her relatives is good news from For her quick recovery and enjoyment of health and well-being. If a girl dreams that she will attend the wedding of one of her relatives, this symbolizes that she will enter a new phase in her life full of achievements and successes that will make her the focus of everyone’s attention. Seeing an engaged, unmarried woman who will attend the wedding of one of her relatives in a dream means that an appointment Her wedding is approaching and she will live with him a decent and happy life full of love and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about participating in a wedding is unknown for women

title: Interpretation of seeing a profession in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing occupation in a dream. Occupation and war in a dream are visions that bring a lot of psychological conflict and pressure to the person who sees them, and this vision causes him severe anxiety and panic from fear of the occupation. . But this vision carries many, many different indications and interpretations depending on the situation in which it was seen. This is what we will learn during today’s article on the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing possessions in a dream and war in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he is on the battlefield, and that he is walking around with the soldiers and eating with them, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will get into trouble. Great with the people around him, but it shows. The end of this problem with a trouble-free understanding. If he sees that he is killing the occupation soldiers, this indicates that the dreamer will triumph over his enemies, and this vision shows success in life and the ability to get rid of the difficulties and severe problems that he faces in his life. But if he sees that he has a large group of soldiers And that they are facing occupation soldiers, this means that the dreamer is facing a large group of enemies, but he will defeat them, and this vision shows that the dreamer is an ambitious person. Who has many tools that help him achieve his dreams easily. If one sees that the occupation caused a strong explosion, then this vision indicates that he will suffer from the disintegration of prisoners and many problems that may lead to many problems and severe fears that he will face in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing war and possessions in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream the outbreak of a strong war between sultans, then this vision indicates the emergence of large and strong disputes in the country, and this vision may indicate the spread of epidemics and diseases in society. But if he sees A man dreams that he is fighting a strong war in his country, but he lost that war and was subjected to possession. This vision indicates that the dreamer will lose a large amount of money, and if he works in it. Trade, and this indicates the loss of trade and that he will suffer many losses in his financial life. But if one sees in a dream that soldiers are fighting in the war field, then this vision indicates the emergence of great strife in the country and this vision indicates the victory of truth. Interpretation of the vision of war and occupation in Dream of an unmarried girl: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is entering a war and competing in the war with someone she knows in reality, then this vision indicates that she will get married soon, but if she sees that she is... Fighting an enemy and being able to defeat him, then this vision indicates that he will hear the happy news. However, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is fighting a war and loses, this means that she will hear the sad news and suffer from loneliness, but if she sees that the country is occupied, this means that she will separate. She suffers from many psychological problems. Interpretation of seeing war and occupation in the dream of a woman married to Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Sirin says: If a married woman dreams that she is dueling her husband with a sword

title: Interpretation of a dream about a donkey. The meaning of a donkey in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a donkey in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, if he attacks me, a rabid stalker, slaughters the bite of a zebra and others. Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqThe donkey is one of the animals that is characterized by strength, patience, and endurance. People use the donkey for a lot of hard work, and the donkey in a dream indicates livelihood. Travel, women and children, all of these factors affect the meaning and interpretation of a dream. Whoever sees a donkey in his dream, unlike the donkey in reality, shows that he is short and tired from the worship he performed, and seeing a donkey shows a woman who helps a man in his life. It was said that seeing a donkey in a dream means an abundant woman. In goodness, and a woman with many offspring, and it was said: from the signification of repeated earnings. And whoever dreams that he hears the sound of a donkey, this indicates dissatisfaction and anxiety, and perhaps a child of prostitution or a genie will appear to the dreamer. And whoever sees a donkey in a big dream, this means that his effort and effort are great and he is in Glory and honor, and whoever sees the opposite is the opposite. A white donkey is an adornment for its owner, a black donkey means happiness and joy, a fat donkey means money, and whoever dreams of the death of his donkey dies or his life is prolonged. And whoever sees that the donkey jumps over the minaret, then the infidel calls people in disbelief, or The innovator calls for people to implement his innovations. Whoever sees that he has donkeys is ignorant, and whoever eats donkey meat in a dream will have money. Whoever dreams that his donkey does not walk except by kicking will not eat except by begging. Whoever dreams that his donkey has become a mule, then his livelihood will come from traveling, and whoever sees If a donkey turns into a horse, then his livelihood will be from the master or the sultan, and whoever sees his donkey becoming seven, then that will be his. Sustenance from the oppressive ruler. And whoever sees in a dream that he is carrying a donkey, God Almighty will give him strength. And whoever sees that he is collecting donkey dung and droppings, he will take money and wealth. And whoever dreams that he brings a donkey to his house or the donkey brings him, goodness and blessing will come to him. Whoever dreams If he bought a specific donkey with two covers, then the dreamer has money, and its location is unknown. And whoever sees that his wife or mother has become pregnant on a donkey in a dream. And whoever sees that he is riding a donkey without a saddle on it, then he will gain leadership and eminence. And whoever dreams that he is riding a colt, then he will be annoyed by the boy or The woman. And whoever sees that he has taken a wild colt in his hand, he will benefit. And whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking donkey milk, he will suffer from malaise and a mild illness, and then God will heal him. And whoever sees in a dream that his donkey has given birth to a donkey, the doors of sustenance will be opened for him. From He dreams in a dream that he is slaughtering a donkey to eat from it, then he is doing good. And whoever sees a donkey in a dream that is one-eyed or weak in sight, he will suffer distress and difficulty in his livelihood. As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted the dream of a donkey to mean a boy, son, or woman. Perhaps it is travel, or knowledge, according to the Almighty’s saying: “Like a donkey that travels.” And whoever finds a donkey contrary to what he knows in his wakefulness shows his indifference to his worship. Owning donkeys in a dream or riding on them is evidence of adornment with money or children, and the donkey is a specific female provider, abundant in goodness, offspring and abundance, and making a donkey and a sacrifice is slander. Perhaps their voice indicates hatred

preview.html: The interpretation of cutting spinach in a dream, and seeing vegetables in a dream, varies from one person to another and from the nature of the dream and the events that occur in it. There is nothing fixed in the interpretation of dreams, but we must take the symbols and their connotations and in this article we will learn about an encyclopedia about spinach and vegetables in a dream. Interpretation of a vision Spinach in a dream: If the dreamer sees fresh spinach, this means that the dreamer will soon acquire some things of great value or gain a lot of money and achieve great profits, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a person sees spinach in a dream, this means that he is afflicted with a disease, but he will recover from it. Soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whoever sees that he is buying spinach, this indicates that he has some worries, problems, and diseases, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If one sees rotten spinach, this may indicate the difficulty of life and the problems that the dreamer is suffering from, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, Seeing spinach in a dream means gaining money and life for the dreamer, because seeing spinach varies depending on the condition of the person who sees it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing spinach in a dream also indicates that the dreamer does not like his life or is too busy and that God is higher and knows best. Seeing spinach in a dream also indicates that the dreamer does not like his life or is too busy and that God is higher and knows best. Yellow color indicates that the dreamer is pessimistic and miserable in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Perhaps seeing spinach in a dream also indicates good luck for the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing someone eating spinach in a dream means happiness, and God knows best. If a person sees fresh green spinach, this indicates In good health, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating spinach in a dream, this indicates that she will soon marry a rich man with whom she will live a decent life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a married woman: Seeing cooked spinach For a married woman, it indicates that pregnancy is approaching, and that she will give birth to a boy and become a good person, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing spinach for a married woman also indicates the happy life of her family and abundance of money, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a pregnant woman: If a married woman sees spinach in a dream, then this It means that her birth will be easy and accessible, and she and her newborn will be in good health, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing spinach by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing spinach in a dream for a married woman can mean a lot of sustenance and money, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Buying spinach in a dream indicates buying Real estate or money, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees that she is selling spinach, this indicates her need for money and the distress of the situation, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a woman sees that she is washing spinach, this indicates tenderness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a woman sees that she is picking spinach, this indicates the end of The relationship or the end of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing spinach by Al-Nabulsi: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spinach indicates purity, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Buying spinach means nutrition, and God knows best. Seeing spinach being cooked indicates that the gender of the baby is male if it is

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about a banknote from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about paper money is one of the interpretations that arouses the dreamer’s interest and arouses a strong desire to get to know him, so in this article we have presented the most accurate meanings of the great jurists and translators on seeing banknotes in a dream, dividing them, and paying them. They and others only the visitor should start reading: Interpretation of a dream about paper money Most dream interpretation books mention that seeing paper money in a dream for the dreamer is an indication that sustenance comes to him from where it does not matter. His forgiveness for what he did to him wherever he was. When the dreamer sees someone he does not know, giving him banknotes in his dream, it shows that he has stopped worshiping. He has an inheritance or wages from work, and this is evidence of the Lord’s blessing in his livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin interprets a banknote in a dream as a sign of the abundance of goodness that will come to the dreamer from where he does not know, unlike if the dreamer loses a banknote In a dream, it means that he has lost something valuable to him. . Heart or loss of a loved one, in both cases one must be patient with God's judgment. Seeing five-denomination bills in a dream may symbolize the number of good deeds a person performs. When one sees money made of paper in his dream and it is brand new, it means that he maintains religious worship, but if this money is in a shabby condition in his dream, This leads to a lack of perseverance in his good habits. If a person dreams of losing banknotes in his dream, this indicates the outbreak of family disputes and crises that must be resolved before they escalate to the extreme. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about papers Cash for Single WomenWhen an unmarried woman dreams of seeing paper money in a dream, this expresses her constant reluctance to make decisions. This dream also suggests that she will be able to fulfill her desires one day. When a girl finds someone stealing banknotes in her dream, this means that she will fall In a misfortune from which she may not be able to escape on her own. Try to reach this position. If the Virgin sees banknotes in a dream, this proves her strong desire to achieve her goals, and if the dreamer notices her carrying banknotes in the dream, then it expresses the hesitation she feels in that period of her life, and if the visionary woman finds money A paper on the ground outside her house while she was sleeping, and this indicates the end of the period of sadness that she was in before. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes for a married woman. If a married woman sees paper money in her dream, this symbolizes the family stability that she feels socially and materially, and wasting it and she must move on from Economy. If the dreamer dreams that her husband gives her a lot of money, including papers and coins, this will lead her to hear happy news. She may become a mother after a while, but when the dreamer sees that she took coins

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating green and black olives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating olives in a dream: When a man dreams of eating olives in a dream, this is a sign of nutrition. It also indicates the search for money at work. The meaning of eating green olives: Whoever has suffered from problems and crises in his personal or professional life and sees himself eating green olives, this is an indication of the end of These differences. Eating green olives in a patient’s dream is evidence of recovery, God willing. The meaning of eating black olives in a dream. Dreaming of eating black olives in a dream means a radical positive change in the dreamer’s life. It also indicates good and happy news in the dream. Eating black olives in a dream It means that you get money. It also indicates the psychological stability that the viewer experiences. Interpretation of the vision of planting olives. A man who dreams that he is picking olives in a dream indicates the realization of the happy news that he was waiting for. It also means spreading goodness and blessings in family life. The meaning of a dream about olives in a dream alone. Girl An unmarried woman who dreams that she is picking olives and is happy indicates that she will soon marry a good man. Any person who dreams of eating olives indicates this good news in her life. It also indicates obtaining a new job. The meaning of seeing olives in a married woman’s dream. A married woman who dreams of picking olives in A pregnant woman in a dream means harvesting olives. A pregnant woman in a dream means that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing a pregnant woman eating olives is a sign of an easy birth, God willing. And the health of the newborn. The meaning of a dream about distributing olives When you dream that you are distributing olives to others in a dream, this is a sign of the dreamer’s pride and dignity. It also indicates his good reputation and his love for helping others. Whoever sees that he is distributing olives to the poor and the needy indicates the abundance of food on its way to the dreamer. It indicates treatment for the sick, the freedom of the prisoner. And repaying the debt to the debtor. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about shaking hands and hugging a deceased person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of greeting a dead person with a hand. When we sleep and dream that we see a dead person who is beloved in the heart and we greet him with our hand, this indicates that we lack the knowledge of the dead person and his need for him. Perhaps it indicates the need of the dead person for prayers and alms in his name. The meaning of seeing a dead person kissing the hand in a dream. The person who dreams that he is kissing the hand of a dead person appears in The dream: humility among the people around him. It also symbolizes the strength of the connection between the dreamer and the dead person through supplication, reading the Qur’an for him, and receiving alms in his name. The meaning of seeing the dead person hugging him and crying over him. Anyone who sees this is hugging the dead person in a dream, and the crying shows serious remorse as a result of the separation. As for whoever sees him hugging and kissing the dead person in the dream, it is It symbolizes the loss of money. Whoever dreams that he is hugging a dead person and crying over him, but without a sound, indicates the upcoming death of anxiety and suffering that the dreamer suffers. But if crying out loud indicates that there are many misfortunes that will befall the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a dead father hugging his daughter. A girl sees Her dead father hugs her and kisses her while she is sleeping, which indicates his satisfaction with her and his feelings. He is proud of the outside. As for someone who dreams that he misses the dead person, this indicates the approach of his death, and God knows best. Perhaps it symbolizes the dreamer’s eagerness to achieve what he wants. The meaning of seeing the arms of a dead father. Whoever dreams of hugging a dead father in... A dream symbolizing the dreamer’s emotional satisfaction and psychological comfort. The vision may mean good and abundant nutrition. As shown by the strong bond between the dreamer and his father and his family. The vision means the dreamer’s long life. The meaning of a dream of hugging a dead mother. The person who sees his dead mother hugging him in a dream shows the dreamer’s abundant kindness. It also indicates death. Anxiety, sadness, and the approaching joy and delight in the heart of the dreamer. As for whoever sees the dead mother sitting in his house, this is a sign that the house is approaching with blessings and goodness. When a married woman dreams that her dead mother hugged her in a dream, this symbolizes: More emotional, material, and familial scenes with her husband. Add The dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: A man marrying his wife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying a second wife

preview.html: A husband marries his wife in a dream is one of the dreams that causes anxiety and fear, especially for a married woman, but the interpretation of the dream often does not indicate that her husband will do so in reality, so today we will refer to the most important interpretations of a woman’s marriage vision. The husband with his wife, the married woman, the pregnant woman, and the man. A man marrying his wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife is an indication that the dreamer will feel sadness and despair in the coming days, and in fact being close to her is evidence of the friendship and relationship between her husband and this woman, so he should be careful. As for For a married woman who dreams that her husband is marrying a famous woman, the dream indicates that she will achieve many benefits in the coming period, and perhaps the second marriage in the dream symbolizes pregnancy soon. As for she who dreams that her husband is marrying a woman, but that woman actually died, these are indications. However, the dreamer is very close to realizing her dreams, and God knows best. A man marrying his wife in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that if she sees an unmarried woman in a dream If a man marries his wife, the second marriage in a dream is an indication that she will find a suitable job in the coming days, as this job will improve her socially. She is accepted in her social environment, regardless of the fact that she will enjoy success in her life. As for an unmarried woman who discovers that a man has married his wife, this is evidence that she will live a happy life and have ample money through which she can live a better life. As for the interpretation of this dream for a married woman , that she has an obsession for her husband to actually marry her, so she is always trying to please her husband. A man marrying his wife in a dream for a married woman. A man marrying his married wife is one of the dreams that causes severe anxiety and fear for a married woman, but Ibn Shaheen interpreted this dream as meaning that the dreamer’s life will be filled with happiness, He will live days with a lot of kindness and sustenance. . The dreamer has many problems. The dream usually emanates from the dreamer’s subconscious and has nothing to do with reality. As for her dream that her husband marries her after her consent, it is an indication that her husband will move in the coming days and she will do so. Fahd Al-Osaimi explained this dream that there is an economic increase soon and all conditions will improve to live in a state of social well-being. Ibn Sirin also said that childbirth would be easy and without problems. He will get a promotion at his job or move to a new job with a better salary. A husband’s marriage to his wife in a dream symbolizes the imminent birth of a pregnant woman, so she must be prepared for this moment. It is a sign that her married life is very successful, even if she is suffering from worsening differences between her and her husband, and at this time the dream largely symbolizes the stability of the situation. A man marrying his wife in a dream for

title: Interpretation of seeing a vase in a dream in detail

preview.html: A jar is a pottery vessel made in a certain way, in which water or liquids and other substances are kept for long periods of time. Seeing a vase in a dream is considered one of the symbols of multiple signs because it can symbolize many things depending on the condition of the dreamer and the state of the vision. Here in this article we will clearly discuss with you all the correct opinions for interpreting seeing a vase in a dream, seeing a vase in a dream, a golden vase in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream. Empty vase and interpretation Dream of a ceramic bowl of water for individuals, so follow these next lines with us. The vase in a dream Seeing a vase in a dream is one of the symbols that carries positive and negative interpretations at the same time. A vase in a dream symbolizes a hypocritical person in one’s life or symbolizes the presence of A hypocritical worker or employee at work. As for seeing someone drinking from a jar in a dream, it symbolizes that the dreamer will reap many benefits from legal and pure sources. Drinking from a vessel in a dream can also symbolize stability, psychological comfort, and calm in situations. And seeing a person drinking From a vase in a dream, half of the water is inside it, this indicates that he will spend half his life. To dream of carrying a vase on your shoulder is a sign of responsibilities and burdens. As for the interpretation of a dream about a broken vase, it could symbolize death or perhaps a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing a jar in a dream filled with honey Oil indicates safety, a warehouse, or storage places, either for money or for goods. There is an opinion that says that a vase in a man’s dream could be a sign that a woman is keeping secrets. It is possible that a vase in a dream is a symbol of a good and happy life and a healthy physical body. The jar In a dream, it is tied with a rope, symbolizing a covenant or agreement between the dreamer and another companion, who may be at work or with his wife. A break in the rope indicates a break in the relationship. And the jar in the dream, if it is empty, symbolizes need, poverty, lack of resources, and bad circumstances. As for Seeing a complete vase in a dream symbolizes success, progress, achievements, and the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. If the vase breaks, this symbolizes illness or perhaps failure and disappointment. As for seeing buying a vase in a dream, it symbolizes success, but after toil, fatigue, and hardship. See also: Signs of gold UndergroundInterpretation of water in a dreamSeeing a pottery pot in a dreamSeeing a pottery pot in a dream symbolizes the occurrence of many happy and joyful occasions. Seeing a pottery pot in a dream symbolizes many good deeds and abundance of money and profits. Seeing a pottery pot in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes To her relationship or marriage in the near future. Seeing a pottery vase in a dream for a married woman indicates the pregnancy of one of her relatives, especially if it is filled with gold. Seeing a pottery vase in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates pregnancy with a boy, but if the vase is colored, it symbolizes pregnancy. With a beautiful woman. A jar of gold in a dream. Seeing a jar of gold in a dream is a praiseworthy vision and symbol

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a new phone and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a new cell phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a new cell phone is one of the visions that many people have, and this is due to the spread of cell phones among large and small people. It also has many interpretations, which differ according to the vision. That sleep and the condition in which the phone is located. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new mobile phone. If one sees in a dream that he is buying one of the different types of mobile phones, this means kindness, blessing, and abundance that the dreamer will receive. If in a dream you see the same vision, and recognize the type of money that was paid , whether made of paper or metal. This is because paying with paper money is a sign of kindness and that the dreamer will soon be blessed by God with great spoils. Phone call in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees that the person she is romantically involved with is in a relationship with her, some interpret it to mean that she feels homesick for this person or lover If an unmarried girl sees that she hears some beautiful words on her phone, this is evidence of the kindness and psychological peace that this girl feels towards her lover. But when this phone call is between a single girl and her lover and emotional words are exchanged, it expresses that this girl has the ability to Getting rid of various negative influences on them, such as boredom, to replace them with feelings of joy and joy. happiness. Interpretation of a dream about pictures on a mobile phone When one dreams of pictures, there will be many interpretations within this dream. If he sees his face shining, the vision will have an interpretation, and if he sees his face frowning or dull, the dream will have another interpretation. We will present all interpretations of a dream with pictures through the following: Selfies have become very popular among the elderly and young people, and although they did not exist at the time when the foundations of dream interpretation were laid, the interpreters gave them an explanation and said that whoever sees in his dream That he takes a selfie, the vision will be interpreted by lies and numerous attempts by the dreamer to deceive himself that he has a number of qualities that he did not possess. For example, a person is a failure in his life and wants to deceive himself that he is successful and has elements of discrimination, knowing that this is a lie. Falsifying facts will have a terrible impact on the viewer, because it will result in confusion and humiliation from the world. If the dreamer dreams that he is in a place outside the house and takes many pictures inside it, this is clear evidence that he loves this place and cares about it, so he continues to go there because he is connected to it with Many. Lives matter. Memories that will never be forgotten. The dreamer’s dream that he is taking many pictures using his cell phone shows his great passion for absorbing a lot of information, and this will have a profound effect in increasing the degree of his general culture and the positive curiosity that characterizes him. They know the events of life and the news about the world in which we live in general, and the news in it is related to politics, the economy, the atmosphere, foreign relations, and other details. Some interpreters indicated that the situation
